briefdescription.para: The A2DP Control path callback type.

detaileddescription.para:
The application implements a callback of this type to receive A2DP control path events.
event
ID of event being notified to app.
p_data
The pointer to data associated with the event.
None.

briefdescription.para: API to initialize the A2DP SOURCE component and register with the stack.

detaileddescription.para:
Called by the application before any other API is called. The application provides source configuration data and control and data callbacks to receive control events and data packets, respectively. Replaced with wiced_bt_a2dp_source_init_ext.
p_config_data
A2DP source configuration parameters. This should remain valid until deinit is called as the pointer is stored and used inside the library.
control_cb
Callback function for receiving source events.
heap
wiced_bt_heap_t pointer to be used in A2dp source profile library
wiced_result_t (WICED_BT_XXX)

briefdescription.para: API to initialize the A2DP SOURCE component and register with the stack.

detaileddescription.para:
Called by the application before any other API is called. The application provides source configuration data and control and data callbacks to receive control events and data packets, respectively. The order of codecs in codec_capabilities is important. This is used to decide which peer sep we open stream on.
p_config_data
A2DP source configuration parameters. This should remain valid until deinit is called as the pointer is stored and used inside the library.
control_cb
Callback function for receiving source events.
heap
wiced_bt_heap_t pointer to be used in A2dp source profile library
wiced_result_t (WICED_BT_XXX)

briefdescription.para: The API to deregister from the stack and to clean up the memory of A2DP source component.

detaileddescription.para:
Called by the application when A2DP source component is no longer needed by it.
wiced_result_t (WICED_BT_XXX)

briefdescription.para: The API to connect to a peer device.

detaileddescription.para:
Called by the app to establish A2DP connection with a peer device.
bd_address
The Bluetooth device address of the device to which connection is requested.
wiced_result_t (WICED_BT_XXX)

briefdescription.para: The API to disconnect the connection from a connected peer device.

detaileddescription.para:
Called by the application to disconnect from a connected A2DP source.
handle
Connection handle corresponding to the peer device to disconnect from.
wiced_result_t (WICED_BT_XXX)

Called by the application when it wants to indicate the peer to start streaming.
handle
Connection handle corresponding to peer device to create a streaming connection.
codec_info
Codec configuration structure pointer.
wiced_result_t (WICED_BT_XXX)

briefdescription.para: The API to send a start response on receiving a start request from the peer.

detaileddescription.para:
Called by the application when it wants to indicate the peer that it is ready to start streaming.
handle
Connection handle corresponding to peer device
label
Transaction label
status
Indicates if a start request is accepted(AVDT_SUCCESS) or rejected(AVDT Error codes)
wiced_result_t (WICED_BT_XXX)

Called by the application when the streaming is to be suspended.
handle
Connection handle corresponding to peer device for which streaming is suspended.
wiced_result_t (WICED_BT_XXX)

memberdef.argsstring: (uint8_t handle, uint8_t *p_media_buf, uint16_t buf_len, uint32_t time_stamp, uint8_t m_pt)
memberdef.name: wiced_bt_a2dp_source_start_streaming

briefdescription.para: The API to send media data.

detaileddescription.para:
Called by the application after streaming is started.
handle
Connection handle corresponding to peer device for which streaming is suspended.
p_media_buf
Pointer to the media buffer to write
buf_len
Size of the buffer
time_stamp
Time stamp
m_pt
Marker and payload byte
wiced_result_t (WICED_BT_XXX)
Contains A2DP Source APIs and definitions.
